mapper.insert: insert into event_ticket (event_id, ticket_type, ticket_amount, ticket_price) values ((select event_id from sys_event where event_name = #{eventName}), #{ticketType}, #{ticketAmount}, #{ticketPrice});
mapper.select: select tt.type_name as ticketType, t.ticket_amount, t.ticket_price from sys_event e inner join event_ticket t on e.event_id = t.event_id inner join event_ticket_type tt on t.ticket_type = tt.type_id inner join sys_user u on e.host_id = u.id where e.event_name = #{eventName} and u.username = #{hostName} order by t.ticket_type;

select t.ticket_amount from event_ticket t inner join sys_event e on t.event_id = e.event_id inner join event_ticket_type tt on t.ticket_type = tt.type_id inner join sys_user u on e.host_id = u.id where u.username = #{hostName} and e.event_name = #{eventName} and tt.type_name = #{ticketType};
